parameters.name: AlignmentIndex
parameters.description: When performing media concatenation, the index of the primary media file (which provides the default transcoding parameters for `Video` and `Audio`, including resolution, frame rate, etc.) in the concatenation list. The default value is 0 (aligning with the first media file in the concatenation list).

parameters.name: CredentialConfig
parameters.description:
**If there are no special requirements, please leave this blank.**

Chain authorization configuration. For more information, see [Using Chain Authorization to Access Other Entity Resources](~~465340~~).

parameters.name: Notification
parameters.description: Notification configuration. For details, click Notification. The format of asynchronous notification messages can be found in [Asynchronous Notification Message Format](~~2743997~~).

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. For how to obtain it, see [Creating a Project](~~478153~~).

parameters.name: Sources
parameters.description: A list of media files. If the list contains more than one element, it indicates that the Concat (concatenation) function is enabled. The Concat order follows the sequence of the input video file URIs.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Custom tags used for searching and filtering asynchronous tasks.

parameters.name: Targets
parameters.description: List of media processing tasks, supporting multiple task configurations.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: User-defined information that will be returned in asynchronous message notifications, used for convenient association and processing within your system. The maximum length is 2048 bytes.
